title: recipes_Kansas_City_Ice_Water
text:
Title: Kansas City Ice Water.
.
Description: Citrus flavors are blended with gin and vodka. A very refreshing drink for hot summer days. Be careful, though - it is easy to have too many of these..
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 fluid ounce gin.
- 1 fluid ounce vodka.
- 0.5 fluid ounce lime juice.
- 0.5 fluid ounce triple sec.
- 3 fluid ounces lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage.
.
Instructions:.
- Combine the gin, vodka, lime juice, and triple sec in a shaker with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled pint glass with ice. Pour in lemon-lime soda, and serve..
.
Nutrients:.
.
Serves: 1 serving.
